public ref class SecuritySafeCriticalAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate, AllowMultiple=false, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 将类型或成员标识为透明代码可以安全访问的安全关键类型或成员。

span.span: Identifies types or members as security-critical and safely accessible by transparent code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型或成员标记有属性可由部分受信任的类型和成员访问。Types or members that are marked with the attribute can be accessed by partially trusted types and members. 这些部分受信任的类型和成员可以将标有任何程序集内或(APTCA) 特性，或它们是部分受信任其他原因，例如要加载到部分信任。These partially trusted types and members can be within any assembly that is marked with the or (APTCA) attribute, or they are partially trusted for other reasons, such as being loaded into partial trust. 使用标记的代码必须受到严格的安全审核，以确保它可以在安全的执行环境中安全地使用。Code that is marked with the must be subject to a rigorous security audit to ensure that it can be used safely in a secure execution environment. 安全-可靠-关键代码必须验证调用方的权限，以确定它们是否有权访问受保护的资源的代码使用。Security-safe-critical code must validate the permissions of callers to determine whether they have authority to access protected resources used by the code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
